meanings.definition: To strike or stamp (a coin) with a design or inscription that overlaps a previous design.
meanings.sent1: The mint worker carefully overstrike the coin to add the new emblem.
meanings.sent2: The artist decided to overstrike the coin with a unique pattern.
meanings.sent3: When the machine malfunctioned, it accidentally overstrike the coin with a smiley face.
meanings.sent4: Her words seemed to overstrike his heart, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The hammer came down hard, causing the overstrike to stand out on the coin.

meanings.definition: A coin that has been struck again with a new design or inscription.
meanings.sent1: The collector was thrilled to add the rare overstrike to his collection.
meanings.sent2: The overstrike displayed a beautiful image of a bird in flight.
meanings.sent3: The overstrike rolled off the table and into the piggy bank with a clatter.
meanings.sent4: In the sunlight, the overstrike gleamed like a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The overstrike was a unique addition to the coin exhibit, drawing many admirers.
